LoginRequired.description: User is required to sign in

SomethingWentWrong.description: Message for unkown errors or error that can't detailed to user
SomethingWentWrong.other: Something went wrong, please try again

UserHasPartnerOrPendingRequest.description: Can not send request because the user either is already in a relation or has a pending request
UserHasPartnerOrPendingRequest.other: You are already have a couple profile or a pending request

UserNotFound.description: The user in reference doesn't exist, maybe due to a typo

InvalidUserName.description: The user name is not a valid one, because it breaks some of our rules

UserLessThan18.description: When user is trying to performs actions not allowed for minors
UserLessThan18.other: Only users 18 yeras or older can perform this action

PartnerLessThan18.description: Sending relationship request to user under 18
PartnerLessThan18.other: Can not complete your request because the person you're sending this request to is not of age

PartnerNotOpenToRequest.description: Sending relationship request to user that is not open to relationships
PartnerNotOpenToRequest.other: Can not complete your request because the user is not open to a relationship

SomethingWentWrongInternal.other: Something went wrong, it's our fault, give it some time and try again.

BadRequest.other: Something is wrong with your request, check it and try again.

RequestCreated.other: Relationship request sent, you'll be notified when the person accepts your request

RequestAccepted.description: Notify user when partner accepts their request

NewCoupleRequest.description: Notify user when the get a couple request

CoupleNotFound.description: The couple in reference don't exist, maybe due to a typo

ProfilePicFailed.description: When user tries to update/change their profile picture but it wasn't successfull

RequestStatusOFF.other: Done, you will no longer get relationship requests

RequestStatusON.other: Done, you will now be able to recieve relationship requests

UserAlreadyExists.description: When user tries to change name but the name already exists

ChangedUserName.description: When user name change is successfull

Followed.other: You are now following this couple

Unfollowed.other: You are no longer follwoing this couple

PostMentionedNotif.description: When user is tagged in a post or video

PartnerNewPostNotif.description: Notify user when partner makes a new post
PartnerNewPostNotif.other: Your partner {{.UserName}} just made new post

CoupleCreated.other: Couple created. Visite your couple page and setup your profile

CoupleAlreadyExists.description: When couple try to change name but the name already exists

YourPartnerBrokeUpWithYou.other: {{.FirstName}} {{.LastName}} no longer want's to have a couple profile

BreakedUp.other: You are no longer in a relationship

LoginFailed.description: user tried to login but it wasn't successfull
LoginFailed.other: Sign in failed, incorrect user name or password

LoginSuccessfull.description: user tried to login and it  was successfull

WrongEmailFormat.description: User enters a wrong email format
WrongEmailFormat.other: Not a valid email, change it and try again

WrongFirstNameFormat.description: User enters a wrong first name format
WrongFirstNameFormat.other: Not a valid first name, change it and try again

WrongLastNameFormat.description: User enters a wrong last name format
WrongLastNameFormat.other: Not a valid last name, change it and try again

WrongUserNameFormat.description: User enters a wrong user name format
WrongUserNameFormat.other: Not a valid user name, change it and try again

WrongPasswordFormat.description: User enters a wrong password format
WrongPasswordFormat.other: Not a valid password, change it and try again

DateOfBirthRequired.description: No date of birth entered during signup
DateOfBirthRequired.other: Date of birth is required. It won't appear on your profile

BelowAgeLimit.other: Only people older than 13 years of age are allowed on the platform.

AboveAgeLimit.other: People above 150 years of age are not allowed on the platform.

InvalidSetting.description: user tries to set something not found in settings

InvalidPartnerRequest.description: Creating a couple with an invalid or  no request
InvalidPartnerRequest.other: Failed to create a couple profile

CoverPicUpdated.description: message when couple change their cover picture

InvalidCommencedDate.other: Date relationship started can not be a past date

InvalidBio.other: Bio can not be longer than 256 characters

InvalidWebsite.other: website can not be longer than 100 characters

InvalidStatus.other: Status can not be longer than 30 characters

VideoTooLong.other: Video can not be longer 30 seconds

VideoProcessingFailed.other: Sorry, we couln't process your video

FileUploadFailed.other: We couldn't uplaod some file but it's our fault, give it some time nad try again

PasswordsDontMatch.description: Signup password and Reapeat password don't match
PasswordsDontMatch.other: Passwords don't match, check password and try again

PostReported.other: Thanks for helping make make the platform better

OnlyCoupleCanPost.description: want to post but is single
OnlyCoupleCanPost.other: Only users with a couple profile can share a post

PartnerHasPartnerOrPendingRequest.other: User is already in a relationship or has a pending request

CantChangeStatus.other: You can't change request status when you have a pending request

PartnerNotOpen.other: The person is not open to requests
